name: Chip-84 3D
description: Chip-84 3D is a port of my CHIP-8/SCHIP-8 interpreter for the Ti-84 Plus CE calculator, Chip-84.  Chip-84 3D takes a twist to emulating CHIP-8 programs in that you can choose from different viewing modes such as a CRT TV, a road sign, graph paper, and more.  This interpreter is able to run most CHIP-8 and SCHIP-8 ROMs.  Full source of this project can be found on Github.
